alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward County through 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, or 12 miles northwest of Sunrise, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Sunrise and Sawgrass Mills Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
